TopicTitle: No SVE atmosphere haze on Kerbin in map mode

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Just built a brand new KSP 1.2.1 install, and I'm using SVE, EVE, Kopernicus, Scatterer, TextureReplacer, and DistantObject. (All visual effect mods) I'm having a problem where the actual atmosphere, along with its blur effect on the planet, is missing.

See here: (Sorry, can't get pictures to post)

http://imgur.com/eSRBJhf

And the dark side of kerbin is not actually dark, whereas normally you could not see hardly anything here:

http://imgur.com/GCURNWp

Also notice in both of these that there is no haze on the horizon. Just the terrain straight to space in the background.

 

As you see here for comparison, it should look like this, with a haze on the horizon:

http://imgur.com/pJkMMCa

 

Also have the same problem with Eve (the planet eve) where instead of seeing the thick atmo covering the planet , I just see some pink and purple stripes with the terrain still visible under it. This is how I want it to look, the atmo actually hazing over the surface:

http://imgur.com/gio86Ck

So I thought I had it like this before at some point with SVE, maybe on a different version. But I can't get it this to show the atmospheres right now. Is there something that conflicts in my mods, or do I not have the right mods for this...? Anyone know specifically what I need to get the atmosphere haze back?

 

Edited November 5, 2016 by Jeb!

The haze is caused by scatterer, scatterer doesn't work in map view or in the tracking station, only in the flight scene.

Unrelated to your question but I would also recommend installing planet shine along side those visual mods

16 hours ago, Akira_R said:

The haze is caused by scatterer, scatterer doesn't work in map view or in the tracking station, only in the flight scene.

Ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh that would explain it on Kerbin. Thanks for clearing that up.

But back to the other planets, How do I get Eve to look like this?: http://imgur.com/gio86Ck 

I had it like this on map view, but I can't remember what I did to get it like this! Eve currently looks like it has no atmo, just a bunch of weird stripes.

 

16 hours ago, Akira_R said:

Unrelated to your question but I would also recommend installing planet shine along side those visual mods

I'll try that too, thanks!

Edited November 5, 2016 by Jeb!
